location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Nicholas Hankey Smith, Resident at Bushire to Jonathan Duncan, President and Governor in Council, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is forwarding a copy of his letter to Neil Benjamin Edmonstone of the same date (see f. 60-60v) and alludes to a packet which is en route to Calcutta, which has been left open so it may be examined by the Government of Bombay. It also includes a request for two cruizers to convey intelligence for the next quarter; it further notes that the Resident will retain Samuel Manesty's cruiser the HCC Teignmouthfor whatever service he requires once it returns from Muscat.
